name: Phase Strike
description: You strike through the Ethereal Plane so your weapon phases through obstacles, armor, and even thick hide to strike true.
benefit: As a move action, you can phase out one manufactured weapon or piece of ammunition you are holding. The next melee attack or thrown ranged attack you make with that weapon before the end of your turn is resolved as a touch attack and ignores cover, but does not ignore armor bonuses from force effects. You can attack through total cover this way, although you must still select the correct square for your target.
